description: This table contains the state of discrete authorities that were being tracked at the time the user interacted with the warning.

columns.name: ALERT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the med alert record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: USER_AUTHORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The discrete authorities that were being tracked at the time the user interacted with the warning.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Prescription Clinical Review

columns.name: AUTHORITY_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The state of the discrete authorities that were being tracked at the time the user interacted with the warning.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unknown Authority


Has Authority


Does Not Have Authority
